Articles.Content:
Ladies, Gents, and Kerbals;

Does KSP generate a 3D model when you build and fly the rocket, or does it just hit the part files a lot? If it generates a 3D model, what format is it in and is it possible to access from an external program?

Cheers,

Moose Cannon
It hits the part files a lot, though I don't see why someone couldn't write a program to read a craft file, the parts files and generate a model
